name: livekit-plugins-silero

chunks.text:
Silero VAD plugin for LiveKit Agents

Support for VAD-based turn detection.

See [https://docs.livekit.io/agents/build/turns/vad/](https://docs.livekit.io/agents/build/turns/vad/) for more information.

Installation

This plugin contains model files that would need to be downloaded prior to use.

usage_description:
Here is a 2-sentence summary of what a developer can achieve with this library:

This library is used to integrate automatic speech detection (VAD) capabilities into LiveKit Agents, allowing developers to detect and handle voice activity in real-time. By using this plugin, developers can enable features such as automated turn-taking and improved audio quality control in their live communication applications.
